alert.note: Alert for Coastal Pender; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pender County through 415 PM EDT... At 352 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Edgecomb, or near Surf City, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Surf City, Topsail Beach, Woodside and Edgecomb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
